name: Parler Dark Glass
description: Use with dark mode, & subscribe to Dan Bongino!
additional_info:
Stuff you probs don't need to know:

The first two images in this code are both for the background image.
The third is for the top navigation bar.
Change this as you like, 
but if you publish your version be sure to use images labeled for reuse, or reuse with modification.
You can use the "tools" provided by Google in their image search to be sure.
